reviewText: First off get the Superman: The Fleischer Cartoons: The Complete Series release because all the others may be good looking but that release was restored by Warner Bros and looks amazing. Great cartoons and writing. Mad scientist, robots and monsters. You gotta love it even as an adult.

Download these for free from Internet Archive as these are all PD (Public Domain) to make a quick buck. If you really want the best quality Superman get the WB official release 2 discs and cheaper then this junk. Max Fleischer's Superman: 1941-1942
